desc: At Lillie’s Q, we believe in staying true to the heritage of the southern barbeque regions I’ve competed in. Explore southern BBQ styles by region as you taste test your way through the sauces and spice rubs of the South.

layout.text: At Lillie’s Q, we believe in staying true to the heritage of the southern barbeque regions I’ve competed in. Explore Southern BBQ styles by region as you taste test your way through the sauces and spice rubs of the South.
